domain_tokens_details.notes: All Tailwind utilities in domain.ts are token definitions that properly reference foundation tokens (semanticSpacing, borderRadius, elevationShadows, DATA_TOKENS, ICON_TOKENS, MOTION_TOKENS). This is correct per audit requirements - token definitions may contain Tailwind classes that map to foundation tokens.

skeleton_details.notes: All skeleton components properly use DOMAIN_TOKENS.skeleton.* or DATA_TOKENS.skeleton.* for all dimensions and styling. No hardcoded values found.

svg_scan_details.notes: No inline SVG elements found in card components. SVG elements found in icon components (src/icons/*.tsx) and story examples are acceptable as they are part of icon component definitions and story documentation.

storybook_details.notes: All story files use proper component imports and do not contain hardcoded Tailwind visual utilities.

improvements.description: All Tailwind utilities in domain.ts are now properly documented as token definitions referencing foundation tokens. This is correct per audit requirements.
All card components now use DOMAIN_TOKENS for spacing. No hardcoded spacing utilities found in EventCard, VenueCard, ArtistCard, TicketCard, PromoCard, or CategoryCard.
All skeleton components properly use tokens. No hardcoded values found.
No inline SVG elements found in card components. All icons use Icon component.
All production readiness checks pass: TypeScript, ESLint, Library build, Storybook build.

resolved_from_L3: L3_S7: TicketCard badge positioning classes - RESOLVED
L3_S8: PromoCard spacing utilities and inline SVG - RESOLVED
L3_S9: CategoryCard spacing utilities and inline SVG - RESOLVED

recommendation: All L3 validations pass. TicketCard badge positioning has been fixed to use DOMAIN_TOKENS.badges.positionY.* tokens. All card components are now fully tokenized. Project is ready to proceed to L4.
next_steps: Continue with next stage of token system implementation
